timeline.message: Updated js/apis/* code to use setBaseUrl. Converted phylocanvascomponent to a functional component
Updated div id for phylocanvas div

timeline.bodyText: Were you having problems with these urls?  Any ajax request gets intercepted before being sent out and updated with the base url.  See line 76 in app.js
timeline.author: joshsadam

replies.bodyText: These ones were not causing any issues but to keep it consistent with the other files I updated these to match those files
replies.author: deepsidhu85

replies.bodyText: Ok, I was worried my interceptor was failing, thanks. 👍
replies.author: joshsadam

replies.bodyText: Oh yeah no worries about that. It works great!
replies.author: deepsidhu85
